    • Method Detail

      • getTrackerItem

        public TrackerItemDto getTrackerItem()

      • setTrackerItem

        public void setTrackerItem(TrackerItemDto trackerItem)

      • getEventMask

        public java.lang.Integer getEventMask()
        Get the bit-mask of subscribed events. This is the logical OR of {NEW_ISSUE, UPDATE_ISSUE, NEW_COMMENT, NEW_ATTACHMENT, NEW_ASSOCIATION}
        Returns:
        the bit-mask of subscribed events, or null (any event)

      • setEventMask

        public void setEventMask(java.lang.Integer eventMask)
        Set the bit-mask of subscribed events.
        Parameters:
        eventMask - The logical OR of {NEW_ISSUE, UPDATE_ISSUE, NEW_COMMENT, NEW_ATTACHMENT, NEW_ASSOCIATION} or null (any event)

      • getFilter

        public TrackerViewDto getFilter()
        Get the optional tracker item filter. If present, this subscription is only valid for items matching the filter
        Returns:
        the optional tracker item filter

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter(TrackerViewDto filter)
        Set the optional tracker item filter. If present, this subscription is only valid for items matching the filter
        Parameters:
        filter - is the optional tracker item filter or null

      • getChangeFilter

        public TrackerViewDto getChangeFilter()
        Get the optional tracker item changes filter. If present, this filter will be used for UPDATE_ISSUE notifications (in addition to the getFilter()), to filter based on the changed fields (and optionally the changed field values).
        Returns:
        the optional tracker item changes filter (TrackerViewDto.ISSUE_CHANGES_FILTER), or null (any changes)

      • setChangeFilter

        public void setChangeFilter(TrackerViewDto changeFilter)
        Set the optional tracker item filter. If present, this filter will be used for UPDATE_ISSUE notifications (in addition to the getFilter()), to filter based on the changed fields (and optionally the changed field values).
        Parameters:
        changeFilter - is the optional tracker item changes filter or null (must be a TrackerViewDto.ISSUE_CHANGES_FILTER), or null (any changes)

      • getUser

        public UserDto getUser()

      • setUser

        public void setUser(UserDto user)

      • getRole

        public RoleDto getRole()

      • setRole

        public void setRole(RoleDto role)

      • getFieldId

        public java.lang.Integer getFieldId()
        Get the ID of the tracker item (member) field, where all users and roles listed in that field should be notified.
        Returns:
        the ID of the tracker item (member) field, or null

      • setFieldId

        public void setFieldId(java.lang.Integer fieldId)
        Set the ID of the tracker item (member) field, where all users and roles listed in that field should be notified.
        Parameters:
        fieldId - the ID of a tracker item (member) field, or null

      • isOnlyMembers

        public boolean isOnlyMembers()
        Check if only direct project members in the specified role should be notified (true), or also indirect members (false)
        Returns:
        true if only direct project members in the specified role should be notified, or false to also notify indirect members

      • setOnlyMembers

        public void setOnlyMembers(boolean onlyMembers)
        Set whether only direct project members in the specified role should be notified (true), or also indirect members (false)
        Parameters:
        onlyMembers - true if only direct project members in the specified role should be notified, or false to also notify indirect members

      • isDeleted

        public boolean isDeleted()
        Check whether this is an inherited notification that was deleted in a derived tracker
        Returns:
        true if this is an inherited notification that was deleted in a derived tracker, otherwise false
        Since:
        CB-7.1

      • setDeleted

        public void setDeleted(boolean deleted)
        Set whether this is an inherited notification that was deleted in a derived tracker
        Parameters:
        deleted - true if this is an inherited notification that was deleted in a derived tracker, otherwise false
        Since:
        CB-7.1
